blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: But when dan said in that liveshow"i'm definitly not stopping youtube"(or something very similar to this) he looked really...
question: But when dan said in that liveshow"i'm definitly not stopping youtube"(or something very similar to this) he looked really honest and determined and he also tweeted that he is waiting for his"aesthetic"to be ready which i belive to be his background so all of that make it seems like he is just really on a hiatus to think about how to come back as his real self on youtube and make video for himself that he likes not for "fanservice" or what the fan wants?Much like "giving the people what i want"
answer: He could still come back to YouTube. I don’t think that’s out of the question at all. I have no idea what his thoughts are on it at the moment as it’s been quite a while since he shared anything more than three words at a time on the issue. I don’t think things will just resume as they were a year ago though, which some people seem to be holding out for, and I think that is just a recipe for disaster. If Dan does come back and make a video and people get mad at him for having changed and grown, I don’t think he will stick it out as he has done in the past. YouTube isn’t as lucrative as it once was, it’s less of a community, and he clearly isn’t getting the type of creative fulfillment he once was either. When people love their jobs, they want to do them. If he was satisfied with the relationship he has with his fanbase, he would want to interact, not just publish a tweet from his drafts when Phil needs to promote some merch or a video or to assure people he’s not dead. I don’t think Dan’s purposely lying to anyone by the way, even if in the end he does quit YouTube. I think he’s just trying to figure out how to feel fulfilled and create healthy boundaries and where YouTube fits into his life now. He said in ttlmt and in the mukbang videos that what he wants is changing from day to day. I’m personally starting to get bored waiting for him to figure it out, but whenever he does, even if I step away in the mean time, I’m sure I’ll check out anything that he does that is for public consumption. Even if Dan does something in the future which is different from what he has done in the past, that isn’t necessarily a bad thing. People grow and change and that’s a part of life. Sometimes doors have to shut for others to open.

Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

icon by gryphll

tags: im not very good with words but i have a lot of feelings about all of these fics
title: fic finder fest masterlist!
body:
Nail painting | Silver Polish - @justshaley
fics that focus on Phil, and his relationship with gender roles and society’s pressures to be a ‘man’ are my absolute favorite, and this one knocks it out of the park. it does such a good job of exploring those thoughts that I can’t help but think that Phil probably has.

Under 1000 words | go the fuck to sleep phil - @itsmyusualphannie
short, sweet and very them. a little slice of life that is wonderful at showcasing their dynamics.

Parenthood | a new day has come - @galhowell
this literally made me cry, but in the best way. it captures the joy and fear of becoming a parent so well, and it made me wanna cuddle my son <3

cuddling on the sofa | first snow of the season - @callofthecurlew
this one just totally melted my heart. I can totally see this being how Phil reacts to the first snow, and all the nostalgia that comes with it. the details and characterization in this fic made me feel like i was sitting with them on the sofa with them.

filming ends in sex | duality - @two-fond-dorks
the title says it all. funny, sexy, sweet, it’s everything I ever want in a fic.

jealous dan | are you mine? - waveydnp
fics that explore Dan’s jealousy, but give them dimension are among my favorite in the world. this fic in particular is so great at exploring Dan’s insecurity and the worry of ‘what are we’ that I’m sure he felt.

Trapped together | Soaking up the thirst of the land - @tortitabby
I’m kicking myself for not reading this one sooner. the way that it manages to capture the fear and anxiety of their situation, without causing anxiety and fear, blew my mind. and the characterization was excellent, really hitting home that even though they are a pair, they are separate people who make their own decision.

hookup app | Swipe Right - @howellesterfics​
I want to read a million more word of this. I loved how real it felt. as someone who has tried online dating, the way that the nerves and excitement are just spot on. and Phil is so sweet :((( 

Blackpool | alone and together - @symmetricdnp
I will never read enough about their 2010 Blackpool trip. a tiny slice of life when things were still so new between them, and everything was a bit up in the air, but they still manage to enjoy each other and their alone time. this fic did such a wonderful job of addressing those things that were a bit scary in the future, but also how great it could be, together. 

window/balcony sex | watch and be watched - @jestbee
even though this is smut, it’s so much more. the imagery and characterization make it hard to believe that you’re not right there with them. I love the way that this tiny random piece of canon was molded into something that just felt so real.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: If I were Dan, I would be regretting the decision of becoming a YouTuber for the rest of my life. He should just quit. Go back...
question: If I were Dan, I would be regretting the decision of becoming a YouTuber for the rest of my life. He should just quit. Go back to uni or do whatever he can to make all this "Phandom" forget about him. But he can't, can he? Because people are so emotionally attached to him, that they could actually hurt themselves. And he seems to be painfully aware of that. Not to mention that Phil's career kinda depends on Dan. It's a horrible situation to be in.
answer: I don’t think Dan regrets his time being a YouTuber, at least I’ve never heard him express that. He has had so many opportunities open up to him as a result, including his ability to take this long period of time off to find himself. If he decides not to want to continue with YouTube, he has that option. Yes, in addition to the changes he would have to make personally as a result, it would effect Phil and his fans, but ultimately he has to live his life for himself, not for others and, as much as I miss his content, I am happy for him that he seems to realize this. Having to make difficult decisions that effect the people around you is unfortunately just a normal part of life and being an adult. Business partners go their separate ways all the time. Bands break up. People quit jobs and move on to new things. Family and friends move away from each other. We don’t really know what he is feeling or what he is going to end up doing career-wise and that is hard for a lot of people to cope with, but I do definitely agree very strongly that it isn’t alright for anyone to put the responsibility for their mental health on Dan. He is an entertainer, not a therapist, and anyone threatening to harm themselves if he doesn’t give into their desires is being manipulative and that’s not cool.

He has had so many opportunities open up to him as a result, including his ability to take this long period of time off to find himself. If he decides not to want to continue with YouTube, he has that option. Yes, in addition to the changes he would have to make personally as a result, it would effect Phil and his fans, but ultimately he has to live his life for himself, not for others and, as much as I miss his content, I am happy for him that he seems to realize this. Having to make difficult decisions that effect the people around you is unfortunately just a normal part of life and being an adult. Business partners go their separate ways all the time. Bands break up. People quit jobs and move on to new things. Family and friends move away from each other. We don’t really know what he is feeling or what he is going to end up doing career-wise and that is hard for a lot of people to cope with, but I do definitely agree very strongly that it isn’t alright for anyone to put the responsibility for their mental health on Dan. He is an entertainer, not a therapist, and anyone threatening to harm themselves if he doesn’t give into their desires is being manipulative and that’s not cool.

blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: i choose to believe what they tell us, so i still have high hopes of dan coming back, but when i read so many people saying he's...
question: i choose to believe what they tell us, so i still have high hopes of dan coming back, but when i read so many people saying he's probably gonna quit i can't help but feel sad; because, even if they tell us to believe something, they have some history of promising something and then end up changing their minds and end up going against what they said would happen
answer: People change their minds. It happens. That’s life. And while Dan hasn’t actually said “you know I changed my mind I think I’m done” you kind of have to wonder. When he keeps saying “yeah I’ll be back. Someday. When the time is right. Or when the content is ready. Maybe when the aesthetic is done. No I’m coming back, really.” And then still never ever doing it? I sometimes wonder if he’s trying to reassure us that he’s coming back, or trying to convince himself that he wants to.

reblog.comment: People change their minds. It happens. That’s life. And while Dan hasn’t actually said “you know I changed my mind I think I’m done” you kind of have to wonder. When he keeps saying “yeah I’ll be back. Someday. When the time is right. Or when the content is ready. Maybe when the aesthetic is done. No I’m coming back, really.” And then still never ever doing it? I sometimes wonder if he’s trying to reassure us that he’s coming back, or trying to convince himself that he wants to.

trail.content_raw: People change their minds. It happens. That’s life. And while Dan hasn’t actually said “you know I changed my mind I think I’m done” you kind of have to wonder. When he keeps saying “yeah I’ll be back. Someday. When the time is right. Or when the content is ready. Maybe when the aesthetic is done. No I’m coming back, really.” And then still never ever doing it? I sometimes wonder if he’s trying to reassure us that he’s coming back, or trying to convince himself that he wants to.
trail.content: People change their minds. It happens. That’s life. And while Dan hasn’t actually said “you know I changed my mind I think I’m done” you kind of have to wonder. When he keeps saying “yeah I’ll be back. Someday. When the time is right. Or when the content is ready. Maybe when the aesthetic is done. No I’m coming back, really.” And then still never ever doing it? I sometimes wonder if he’s trying to reassure us that he’s coming back, or trying to convince himself that he wants to.
